subject: Suits and Litigation
College Athletics
Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Mike Leach, Texas Tech’s former head coach, says filings in his lawsuit over his firing will clear his name; the other side says the same documents are devastating to his case.
snippet: Mike Leach, Texas Tech’s former head coach, says filings in his lawsuit over his firing will clear his name; the other side says the same documents are devastating to his case.
